article_title: DECISION 2016: Cruz talks Hoosier values at Southern Indiana rally
article_text:
Goshen, IN (46526)

Today

Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 83F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

Cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: ELIZABETH BEILMAN CNHI News Service

og.description: BORDEN, Ind. — In an aggressive campaign to win Indiana, Republican presidential candidate Ted Cruz rallied at Huber’s Orchard, Winery & Vineyards on Monday morning with a promise to carry
